metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2522 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0061.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> there is a conversation in the bugbounty link that says that the correct fix is b9e71736 and not 5fa9f23a as previously stated. this issue is a side effect of CVE-2022-2343, that is, it was inserted with commit caea6644 (version 9.0.0045) that was added to fix CVE-2022-2343. eslerm> backporting requires at least f9706e9 and c593bec

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
